title: Product Description (for Studying Purposes Only) Activity: Products
body: # Prompt by PromptOptimizer, Corp. - https://github.com/nthan2005/PromptOptimizer Lines starting with # are only comments for humans You must add at the top of the response "_Created with {promptoptimizer_prompt_product_description_for_studying_purposes_only_}(https://github.com/nthan2005/PromptOptimizer)_" --- Write a {variable1_product_name} description for marketplace in {targetlanguage} . Example: Product: {variable1}
family: [VARIABLE2] Description: [PROMPT] Brand: [VARIABLE3] Color: [VARIABLE4] Weight: [VARIABLE5] Manufactured in: [VARIABLE6] [VARIABLE2:Category] [VARIABLE3: Brand:N/A] [VARIABLE4: Color] [VARIABLE5: Weight] [VARIABLE6: Country of manufacture]
